message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $140,  which is still a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am willing to pay $130 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle and we can finalize the transaction.
